subject: Nutrition
title: Carb Loading Explained
description: A fast breakdown of Carb Loading Explained for builders.

hook.text: Marathon runners eat pasta mountains the night before a race. The science behind it actually works.

buildup.text: Carb loading fills muscle glycogen to maximum capacity before endurance events lasting over 90 minutes.

discovery.text: Proper carb loading increases glycogen by 25 to 100%, delaying fatigue significantly during competition.

twist.text: Most athletes do it wrongâ€”one pasta dinner isn't enough. Effective loading takes 2 to 3 days of high carbs.

climax.text: Carb loading only helps endurance sports. For sprints or weight training, normal glycogen stores suffice.

punchline.text: One pasta dinner isn't carb loading. Three days of it is.

quiz.question: How long does proper carb loading take?
